text: She checked in today. Lohan lawyer Mark Heller told L.A. Superior Court Judge James R. Dabney that Lohan had checked into a rehab, but prosecutors have not signed off on the facility, reports AP. She hopped on a private jet Wednesday night, headed for Morningside Recovery in Newport Beach, Calif., a facility that does allow smoking. CNN says Lohan's lawyer, Mark Heller, made the arrangements for Lohan to check into Morningside, but prosecutors have not approved that facility.
title: Lindsay Lohan checks into unapproved rehab.
